data.eml:eml: Gastrodia kachinensis (Orchidaceae), a new species from Myanmar

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Aung, Ye Lwin, Jin, Xiaohua (2018): Gastrodia kachinensis (Orchidaceae), a new species from Myanmar. PhytoKeys 94: 23-29, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.94.21348, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.94.21348
